pcd.gui.base

Class PCDClickListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • pcd.gui.base.PCDClickListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, pcd.imageviewer.ImageMouseClickListener

    public class PCDClickListener
extends Object
implements pcd.imageviewer.ImageMouseClickListener
    Author:
    Tibor Sloboda, Noemi Farkas A mouse listener for tap-clicking on the image viewport

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private ImageDataStorage imgDataStorage
      A reference to instantiated ImageDataStorage.
      private static org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger LOGGER 
      private MainFrame parentFrame
      The parent frame from which to listen for clicks.
      private PcdPoint selectedPoint
      Keeps the reference to the last selected point, in order to set it as selected or deselect it, so that two points can't end up being selected at once.

    • Field Detail

      • LOGGER

        private static final org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger LOGGER

      • imgDataStorage

        private final ImageDataStorage imgDataStorage
        A reference to instantiated ImageDataStorage. Used to update and manipulate points in response to clicks.

      • parentFrame

        private final MainFrame parentFrame
        The parent frame from which to listen for clicks. Manipulates tables based on changes.

      • selectedPoint

        private PcdPoint selectedPoint
        Keeps the reference to the last selected point, in order to set it as selected or deselect it, so that two points can't end up being selected at once.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PCDClickListener

        public PCDClickListener(MainFrame frame,
                        ImageDataStorage imgDataStorage)
        Initializes the listener with the parent frame and ImageDataStorage
        Parameters:
        frame - the parent frame, specifically MainFrame
        imgDataStorage - the instantiated image object storage

    • Method Detail

      • setSelection

        public void setSelection(PcdPoint p)
        Programatically selects a point based on selection of table row. Also updates the score to 1.0, since the point is now considered 'verified'. Repaints the overlay after it is done.
        Parameters:
        p - the point to select

      • mouseClicked

        public void mouseClicked(pcd.imageviewer.ImageMouseEvent e)
        If left click is used, it adds a new point based on selected type if distance from closest point exceeds 50. Otherwise, select the closes point to the click location.

        If right click is used, the closest point within 50 pixels is removed.

        Finally, if middle click is used, an angle is removed from a cilia

        After any point modifications are made, the tables in the main GUI are updated, and any selections cause highlighting of the point that is selected.

        Specified by:
        mouseClicked in interface pcd.imageviewer.ImageMouseClickListener
        Parameters:
        e - the mouse event
        See Also:
        PcdPoint.select()

      • remPoint

        public void remPoint(PcdPoint p)
        Updates tables of the main GUI and removes the point from the image object The angles are re-calculated if changes were made to an angle
        Parameters:
        p - the point to be removed

      • getSelection

        public PcdPoint getSelection()
        Retrieves the currently selected point.
        Returns:
        the currently selected point
